Container.Name: DashGate
Container.Overview: DashGate is a self-hosted application gateway and dashboard. Features multi-method authentication (local, LDAP, OIDC/SSO, proxy auth, API keys), group-based access control, automatic app discovery from Docker/Traefik/Nginx/NPM/Caddy, health monitoring, and PWA support.
Container.Description: DashGate is a self-hosted application gateway and dashboard that serves as a central hub for accessing all your web applications. It supports multiple authentication methods including local accounts, LDAP, OIDC/SSO, proxy authentication (Authelia/Authentik), and API keys. Group-based access control lets you restrict which apps users can see. Automatic app discovery pulls services from Docker, Traefik, Nginx Proxy Manager, and Caddy. Built-in health monitoring checks app availability. Includes a PWA-ready progressive web app with offline support, encrypted secrets at rest, and structured audit logging.
Container.Requires: For Docker auto-discovery, enable the Docker socket mount below.

Config.Name: Config Storage
Config.Description: Persistent storage for config.yaml and SQLite database.

Config.Name: Session Duration (Days)
Config.Description: How many days a login session stays valid.

Config.Name: Encryption Key
Config.Description: 64-char hex string for encrypting secrets at rest. Leave empty to auto-generate.

Config.Name: Docker Socket
Config.Description: Docker socket for auto-discovering containers. Optional.

Config.Name: NPM Email
Config.Description: NPM admin email for API login.

Config.Name: NPM Password
Config.Description: NPM admin password for API login.

Config.Name: LLDAP URL
Config.Description: LLDAP server URL for user directory (e.g., http://lldap:17170).
